## ReadableEthersLiquity.getSTBLStake() method

Get the current state of an STBL Stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSTBLStake(address?: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<STBLStake>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address that owns the STBL Stake. |
